collective.duskconfig.title: Collective Config
collective.duskconfig.DESC_transferItems: When enabled, transfer the held items and armour from replaced entities by any of the Entity Spawn mods which depend on Collective.
collective.duskconfig.DESC_loopsAmountUs: The amount of times Collective loops through possible mob drops to get them all procedurally. Drops are only generated when a dependent mod uses them. Lowering this can increase world load time but decrease accuracy.
collective.duskconfig.loopsAmountUsedToG: Loops Amount Used To Get All Entity Drops
collective.duskconfig.DESC_findABlockche: The delay of the is-there-a-block-around-check around entities in ms. Used in mods which depends on a specific blockstate in the world. Increasing this number can increase TPS if needed.
collective.duskconfig.findABlockcheckAro: Find A Block Check Around Entities Delay Ms
collective.duskconfig.DESC_enableAntiRep: Please check out https://stopmodreposts.org/ for more information on why this feature exists.
collective.duskconfig.DESC_enablePatronP: Enables pets for Patrons. Will be added in a future release.
